my_page:VBOX                header_row          body            <>

# a comment line
header_row:VBOX             row_a               row_b           row_c
                            row_d               row_e           row_f
                            row_g
body:QVBoxLayout (comment)  topic_a             topic_b         topic_c
custom_a:Find:CustomLayout  foo                 bar             baz
